title: [Self-Directed] Simulation-Based Instructional Design for AI Competency Integration in Nursing Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and clinical practice experience
context.additional_context: Performing AI-assisted clinical scenario simulations in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment

learning_goals: One can explain AI-based clinical decision-making processes according to Bloom's Revised Taxonomy (BRT) levels 4 (Understanding, Applying, Analyzing, Evaluating)
One can perform patient data analysis simulations using AI tools at each SAMR model stage (Substitution, Augmentation, Modification, Redefinition)
One can design and execute virtual patient management scenarios applying AI predictive models in VR environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
